source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of the In der Burg square, located within the Hofburg Palace complex in Vienna, Austria. The scene is dominated by the grand palace buildings and the central monument to Emperor Francis I. The time-lapse effect shows crowds of people as blurred motion, bustling through the sunny square.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video of the In der Burg square, located within the Hofburg Palace complex in Vienna, Austria. The scene is dominated by the grand palace buildings and the central monument to Emperor Francis I. The time-lapse effect shows crowds of people as blurred motion, bustling through the sunny square.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several cyclists ride through the square in a coordinated group, which is not depicted in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video captures the vibrant activity in the In der Burg square, part of the Hofburg Palace complex in Vienna, Austria. The scene is highlighted by the grand palace buildings and the central monument to Emperor Francis I. In addition to the bustling crowds, the video features a coordinated group of cyclists riding through the sunny square, adding to the dynamic atmosphere.
